title: Migration help page
description: Create migration tables, test data and more

line1.description: Creates table structure creator stored in /App/Database/Migration/
line1.option: --table: Creates ONLY table structure for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Migration/[Table_name]/Table
line1.option: --data: Creates table structure and data filler for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Migration/[Table_name]
line1.option: --onlydata: Creates ONLY data filler for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Migration/[Table_name]/Data
line1.option: --caller: Creates migration caller for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Migration/[Table_name]
line1.example:
php lora migrate:create my-table --data 	 php lora migrate:create auth --caller 
 			 php lora migrate:create news_users --data folder=news

line2.description: creates data filler for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Seed/

line3.argument: --clear: If argument is --clear -> migrate with truncating tables first

line4.description: Remove old tables and create new tables from migration folder
